title: Drawing, "Valley Near Guaranda", June 3, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on buff paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at center back:  Emerald; again in foreground: rich green, and at bottom right:  Guaranda June 3d 57.
description: Horizontal view of valley with a stream receding toward left background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Valley Near Guaranda", June 3, 1857.
June 3, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on buff paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-197.
